name: Flying Saucer (itch) (Samieh)
description:
Flying Saucer is a "endless-runner" or flyer I guess, where the level is randomly generated. You just fly up or down, trying to get through the gaps in between the obstacles.

Many game developers say that the first game you should try to make is flappy bird. Of course I didn't do this, so I made a dozen unfinished projects. So eventually I decided Id make a game inspired by flappy bird, and actually finish it to a fully playable state. So here it is, and feel free to leave any feedback, it is always appreciated.
